short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends highlighted text and URL of page to Productlane as a note

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to select any text on a page and send it directly to Productlane as a note. 

NOTE:  The extension requires you to enter an API key and sent-from email in the extension settings, accessed by clicking on the logo in the address bar.
